metadata.title: CVE-2015-4696 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in libwmf 0.2.8.4 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted WMF file to the (1) wmf2gdor (2) wmf2eps command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4696` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwmf-bin - 0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1
libwmf0.2-7 - 0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1
libwmf0.2-7-gtk - 0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libwmf package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1').
